decks.notes: This deck revolves around the combo of using Amulet of Vigor to untap lands when playing creatures, combined with Primeval Titan's ability to search for important lands like Urza's Saga and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. The deck also includes cards like Azusa, Lost but Seeking and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove to further increase the number of lands played each turn. The main strategy is to quickly ramp up mana and tutor for key lands, allowing the deck to generate a large amount of mana and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of creature removal, counterspells, and card advantage. It aims to consistently hit its land drops and generate value through efficient spells. With a diverse mana base, it can cast a wide range of spells and handle various threats. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a powerful companion that provides additional value and flexibility. The deck's strength lies in its ability to adapt to different matchups and outvalue opponents in the long game.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Wrenn and Six. It aims to slow down the opponent's game plan while generating card advantage and value through cards like Abundant Growth and Expressive Iteration. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for extra card advantage and versatility in longer games. The deck also includes efficient creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply pressure and close out the game when needed.

This deck focuses on casting spells with cascade abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent with multiple threats on the board. By utilizing cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck aims to cascade into powerful creatures and spells while also disrupting the opponent with counter magic and removal spells. The deck's aggressive strategy is supported by tempo plays with bounce effects like Brazen Borrower and Cryptic Command, allowing for a quick and efficient way to close out the game before the opponent can establish their own board presence.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Brazen Borrower, while also utilizing Cascade cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst to overwhelm the opponent with multiple spells in a single turn. The deck also includes versatile cards like Archmage's Charm and Force of Negation for control elements. The land base includes a mix of fetchlands and shocklands to ensure consistent mana fixing. The goal is to quickly deploy threats and cascade into powerful spells to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional mana ramp and flexibility in deck building. The deck focuses on efficiently dealing damage with a mix of creatures like Scion of Draco, Bloodbraid Elf, and Territorial Kavu, along with spells like Tribal Flames, Lightning Helix, and Lightning Bolt. The mana base is designed to support the diverse color requirements of the deck, ensuring consistent access to the necessary colors for spells and creatures.

The deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for and put into play using various tutor effects like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution. The goal is to create powerful synergies between creatures and combo off with cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Grist, the Hunger Tide. Blood Artist provides a win condition by draining the opponent's life total, while Endurance and Scavenging Ooze can disrupt the opponent's graveyard strategies. The deck also includes mana dorks like Birds of Paradise and Ignoble Hierarch to accelerate its game plan.

This deck focuses on creating a fast-paced aggressive strategy by using cascade effects to generate additional value and tempo. By combining creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Endurance with cascade spells like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of powerful threats. The inclusion of disruptive spells like Force of Negation and versatile removal like Fire/Ice and Dead/Gone allows the deck to maintain control of the board while pushing for a quick victory. Additionally, the land base is carefully constructed to support the deck's aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of removal spells, counterspells, hand disruption, and powerful planeswalkers to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The main win conditions are through Shark Typhoon tokens, The Wandering Emperor, and chip damage from creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy, remove threats efficiently, and generate card advantage to grind out a win in the late game. The manabase is designed to support the color requirements of the spells while also providing utility lands for additional benefits.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through the use of powerful elemental creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Risen Reef and Omnath, Locus of Creation, the deck aims to generate card advantage and tempo while keeping the opponent's board in check with removal spells like Solitude and Lightning Bolt. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value through blinking creatures and lands. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's multicolor requirements and ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board while generating incremental value through Elemental creatures and spells. Utilizing cards like Risen Reef and Omnath, Locus of Creation to ramp up mana and draw cards, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and overwhelm them with powerful Elemental creatures. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds extra value by flickering permanents for additional ETB triggers. The mana base is diverse, allowing for flexibility in casting spells of different colors to adapt to various board states.

This deck aims to aggressively control the board through a combination of evasion, card advantage, and efficient removal spells. By utilizing powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with disruptive counter spells like Counterspell and Archmage's Charm, it can apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the game. Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration provide card selection and velocity, ensuring the deck can consistently apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is streamlined for consistency and quick access to all necessary colors.

The deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. It also utilizes powerful planeswalkers and value creatures to generate extra value and outvalue the opponent in the long game. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game, answer threats efficiently, and eventually win through incremental advantage and overwhelming the opponent with its robust card advantage engine.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and planeswalkers, while also utilizing cards that provide card advantage and mana fixing. The deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan before eventually overwhelming them with powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad allows for additional flexibility and value through blinking permanents. The mana base is carefully constructed to support a variety of colors and ensure smooth gameplay.

The deck focuses on using the Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate additional mana to quickly assemble the combo of Primeval Titan and Urza's Saga. This combo allows the player to search for key lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle or Castle Garenbrig to deal massive damage or generate extra mana. The deck also includes cards like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove and Azusa, Lost but Seeking to ramp up mana production, while also having utility lands like Bojuka Bog for graveyard hate. Overall, the deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm opponents with powerful land combos.

The deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for and played at instant speed to create combo synergies. Creatures like Hapatra and Yawgmoth, along with support cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution, allow for versatile and powerful plays. The deck also includes cards like Zulaport Cutthroat for additional combo potential. The mana base is built to support the toolbox strategy, with a mix of lands that provide various colors of mana and even an Urborg to help fix mana.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively and utilizing the Death's Shadow archetype to deal massive amounts of damage quickly. By using cards like Death's Shadow, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, the goal is to pressure the opponent early on and maintain a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Drown in the Loch help to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also fueling the deck's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory.

This deck focuses on assembling the combo of Colossus Hammer and Puresteel Paladin to quickly deal massive damage to the opponent. By using equipment tutors like Stoneforge Mystic and Urza's Saga to find the key pieces and protecting the combo with tools like Giver of Runes and Shadowspear, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful and aggressive strategy. The addition of low-cost artifacts like Ornithopter and Memnite allows for explosive starts and the potential to quickly win the game before the opponent can react.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient and aggressive creatures like Tarmogoyf, Ragavan, and Kroxa, supported by disruptive spells like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Inquisition of Kozilek. The main goal is to apply pressure early on while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Kolaghan's Command. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Dreadbore while generating value with cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Wrenn and Six. Overall, the deck aims to win through a combination of creature damage and resource denial.

This deck focuses on using cards that can cycle or be cascaded into to put powerful creatures into the graveyard, then utilize Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield for a massive board presence. The deck includes creatures with high power and toughness that can quickly close out the game once they hit the field. The deck also includes disruption spells like Force of Negation to protect the combo and keep the opponent off balance. The mana base is built to support the colors needed for the combo while also providing consistency in drawing the right cards.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and efficient removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while rapidly deploying threats on the battlefield. The inclusion of Obosh as a companion enhances the deck's damage output, making it even more difficult for opponents to stabilize. With a mix of hand disruption, versatile removal, and powerful creatures like Ragavan and Seasoned Pyromancer, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out games quickly before the opponent can establish a strong board presence.

The main focus of this deck is to put pressure on the opponent quickly by playing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Murktide Regent. The deck also includes powerful control elements like Counterspell and Lightning Bolt to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By combining aggressive creatures with efficient control spells, the deck aims to maintain a strong board presence while controlling the opponent's actions. Additionally, cards like Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble help the deck operate smoothly and efficiently. Overall, the deck seeks to win the game through a combination of aggression and control.
